 Considering public emotion regarding SS, obtaining congressional support for the scheme will prove to be a very rough road. As being reflected by equity market reactions every time the subject makes the news. While it would be a windfall bonanza for brokerage firms, even the general public has grave doubts about its feasibility. That's a real first.

I think Greenspan has had a long and illustrious career, but it's time to step down.
